T02D1358:94a-1: shr'i k'a la tsa kra s'a dha na n'a ma /

T02D1358:94b-1: de'i sras rnams la gus pas /

T02D1358:94b-7: phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dang mnyam por gzhag pa ste /
T02D1358:94b-8: ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud
T02D1358:94b-9: rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsam
T02D1358:94b-13: ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba ni /

T02D1358:94b-15: gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
T02D1358:94b-16: dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid

T02D1358:94b-18: ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par

T02D1358:94b-21: badzram badzr'a badzr'a mri ta sv'a bh'a ba ku ru

T02D1358:94b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod
T02D1358:95a-0: pa ni / gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams @95a * //

T02D1358:95b-0: mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba @95b

T02D1358:99b-29: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
T02D1358:99b-30: l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje mthar
T02D1358:99b-31: byed ser po chu min gyi lam nas bton te
T02D1358:99b-32: / nub phyogs su zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
T02D1358:99b-33: de ltar l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs
T02D1358:99b-34: po che ser po rdo rje gtsug tor nas bton
T02D1358:99b-35: te / rlung gi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
T02D1358:99b-36: yang na sdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas thams cad nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
T02D1358:100a-0: de nas gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du zad par nam mkha' la sogs pa @100a * //
T02D1358:100a-2: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar thugs kar
T02D1358:100a-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nga nya na man rnams
T02D1358:100a-4: brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02D1358:100a-5: nga d'a las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par nam
T02D1358:100a-6: mkha'i sngon du bshad pa'i sgo rnams nas bton te
T02D1358:100a-7: / gzhal yas khang gi steng dang gnod mdzes rgyal
T02D1358:100a-8: po'i 'og dag tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom
T02D1358:100a-9: / par bya'o // de ltar nir n'ir dag las
T02D1358:100a-10: yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me
T02D1358:100a-11: mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o
T02D1358:100a-12: / par bya'o // // de ltar nir n'ir dag
T02D1358:100a-13: las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par me lho dang
T02D1358:100a-14: bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o
T02D1358:100a-15: / par bya'o // // // de ltar mu m'u
T02D1358:100a-16: dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par chu byang
T02D1358:100a-17: dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su chu'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1358:100a-19: de ltar nil n'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1358:100a-20: zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su sa'i dkyil
T02D1358:100a-22: de ltar gha dzha dha bha dha rnams su brtsegs pa'i yi ge bsgoms la /
T02D1358:100a-23: de rnams las phyogs skyong bcu spro ba ni /
T02D1358:100a-24: gha gh'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug / ljang gu dang sngon po /
T02D1358:100a-25: ngang pa dang bya khyung la gnas pa /
T02D1358:100a-29: de nas dzhri dzh'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1358:100a-30: bden bral dang rlung lha dag / kha dog nag
T02D1358:100a-31: po / yi dags dang ri dags la gnas pa /
T02D1358:100a-33: de ltar lho dang bden bral du /
T02D1358:100a-34: dhri dhr'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje dang me lha /
T02D1358:100a-35: kha dog dmar po ma he dang lug la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100a-36: de ltar byang dang dbang ldan du bhu bh'u dag
T02D1358:100a-37: las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho dang bde byed
T02D1358:100a-38: / kha dog dkar po chu srin dang khyu mchog la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100a-39: de ltar nub phyogs dang rlung du dhli dh'il dag
T02D1358:100a-40: las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin
T02D1358:100a-42: glang po che dang ba man la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100a-43: de ltar phyogs skyong rnams ra ba'i nang du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:100a-44: de nas rab bsrung ba'i don du gza' rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:100a-45: sngon du gsungs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1358:100a-46: ga dza da ba da rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas pa las /
T02D1358:100a-47: ga g'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me /
T02D1358:100b-0: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la @100b gnas pa /
T02D1358:100b-1: rab gsum la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1358:100b-2: de ltar dzi dz'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1358:100b-3: zla ba dang nyi ma rlung gi dkyil 'khor la
T02D1358:100b-4: gnas pa / shar dang me mtshams su dgod do //
T02D1358:100b-5: dri dr'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gza' lag dang bkra shis /
T02D1358:100b-7: lho dang bden bral du dgod do //
T02D1358:100b-8: de ltar bu b'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1358:100b-9: pa wa sangs dang phur bu chu'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1358:100b-10: gnas pa / byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o //
T02D1358:100b-11: de ltar dli dl'i dag las yongs su dag pa'i mjug rings dang spen pa /
T02D1358:100b-12: sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu ste /
T02D1358:100b-13: 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams bsgom pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-14: de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste /
T02D1358:100b-15: sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1358:100b-16: kha tsha tha pha tha rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du
T02D1358:100b-17: bsams nas / kha kh'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba /
T02D1358:100b-18: ra ba lnga la phyogs pa steng 'og nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-19: de ltar tshi tsh'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1358:100b-20: karko ta dang padma dag / shar dang me mtshams
T02D1358:100b-21: su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-22: de ltar thri thr'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu bdag dang dung skyong /
T02D1358:100b-23: lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-24: de ltar phu ph'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dga' bo dang rigs ldan /
T02D1358:100b-25: byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-26: de ltar thli thl'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1358:100b-27: padma chen po dang 'jog po nub dang rlung dag
T02D1358:100b-28: tu sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-29: de nas ra ba lnga'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i
T02D1358:100b-30: don du 'byung po lha ma yin rnams bsgom par
T02D1358:100b-31: bya ste / sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i
T02D1358:100b-32: dkyil 'khor la ka tsa ta pa ta rnams brtsegs
T02D1358:100b-33: pa'i tshul du bsam pa ste /
T02D1358:100b-34: de rnams kyang ra ba la phyogs pa steng dang
T02D1358:100b-35: 'og tu ka k'a dag las yongs su dag pa'i
T02D1358:100b-36: ro langs dang / ka sha m'andu nam mkha' dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1358:100b-37: de ltar tsi ts'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ki na ra ga dang /
T02D1358:100b-38: kim pu ru sha khyi dang bya rog gi gdong can /
T02D1358:100b-39: shar dang mer rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dgod do //
T02D1358:101a-1: ngag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dri za dang 'byung po /
T02D1358:101a-2: phag pa dang bya rgod kyi gdong pa can /
T02D1358:101a-3: lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod do //
T02D1358:101a-4: de ltar pu p'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i srin po dang yi dags /
T02D1358:101a-5: stag dang 'ug pa'i gdong can byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do //
T02D1358:101a-6: de ltar tli tl'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i brjed byed ce sbyang gi gdong pa can dang /
T02D1358:101a-8: nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod do //
T02D1358:101a-9: de rnams thams cad shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1358:101a-10: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar /
T02D1358:101a-11: ye shes dang nam mkha' dang /
T02D1358:101a-15: sa rnams khams drug las byung ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dang /
T02D1358:101a-20: klu rnams dang 'byung po rnams sde tshan drug gi bdag nyid srung zhing skyong ba /
T02D1358:101a-21: phyi dang nang rnams su kha sbyor du gnas pa rnal 'byor pas dgod do //
T02D1358:101a-22: de nas bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams la gdab par bya ba ni /
T02D1358:101a-23: de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar de las
T02D1358:101a-24: gzhan pa bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams
T02D1358:101a-25: rdo rje lcags kyus khug cig / rdo rje zhags
T02D1358:101a-26: pas chings shig / khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje
T02D1358:101a-27: phur bu rtse mo mdung gi rnam pa rnams gnas
T02D1358:101a-28: bcur sdang ba btab par bsam mo //
T02D1358:101a-29: sngags rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1358:101a-30: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02D1358:101a-31: badzra k'i la ya k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'ana
T02D1358:101a-32: aa dhi pa de sha ta mu kha sha ta
T02D1358:101a-33: sarba tsa ra na sarba bighna bi n'a ya k'a
T02D1358:101a-34: di du sht'a nam k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a
T02D1358:101a-35: n'a ni k'ila ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1358:101a-36: ces pa ni gdab pa'i sngags so //
T02D1358:101a-37: aom lli badzra mu dga ra /
T02D1358:101a-38: m'a r'a d'i n'am shi ra si kanthi hri da ye /
T02D1358:101a-39: n'a bhoo gu hya aa na te badzra k'i la
T02D1358:101a-40: ya k'a na a'a ko ta y'a ko ta ya
T02D1358:101a-41: / ksham ksh'am kshim ksh'im kshrim kshr'im kshum ksh'um kshlim kshl'm ksham ksh'am h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02D1358:101a-42: ces pa ni gdung ba'i sngags so //
T02D1358:101a-43: de nas nga rgyal byas nas phur bu rnams bsrung ba'i don du /
T02D1358:101a-44: khro bo bcu la bka' bsgo ba ni /
T02D1358:101a-45: de'i don du dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal bor gsungs pa /
T02D1358:101a-46: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dbyug sngon can gyis
T02D1358:101a-47: bdud rnams ma lus rdung bar byed par 'gyur ro
T02D1358:101a-48: // dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs khro bo mi
T02D1358:101a-49: g-yo ba yis 'ching ste phur 'debs shin tu brtson
T02D1358:101b-1: 'jig rten sa ster gyur par gnod mdzes rgyal pos
T02D1358:101b-3: gtsug tor can gyis de yi rdzu 'phrul 'jig ste
T02D1358:101b-4: nges par khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyis snga ma
T02D1358:101b-6: aom h'um kro dhe ndro& ham kro dh'a n'am a'a dzny'a d'a ya kasv'ah'a /
T02D1358:101b-7: de nas khro bo rnams la so so'i sngags kyi rkang pas bka' bsgo ba /
T02D1358:101b-8: aom ham badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a au
T02D1358:101b-9: shn'i sha a'u rdha di shi rksham ku ru ku
T02D1358:101b-10: ru sv'a h'a / aom yam badzra kro dha r'a
T02D1358:101b-11: dza aa dhi pa la sarba bi gha n'a nta
T02D1358:101b-12: ka p'u rba di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru
T02D1358:101b-13: ru sv'a h'a / sv'a h'a / aom ram badzra
T02D1358:101b-14: kro dha r'a dza dzam bha ka du sht'im pradzny'a
T02D1358:101b-15: nta ka dkshi ne di shi raksham ku ru ku
T02D1358:101b-16: ru sv'a h'a / sv'a h'a / ru sv'a h'a
T02D1358:101b-17: / aom wa badzra kro dha r'a dza man ga
T02D1358:101b-18: bi ra ga padm'anta ka autta ra di shi ra
T02D1358:101b-19: ksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:101b-20: aom lam badra kro dha r'a dza stam bha ka
T02D1358:101b-21: ya m'anta ka pa shtsi mdi di shi raksh'am ku
T02D1358:101b-25: aom l'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a ba
T02D1358:101b-26: la b'a ya by'am de shi raksh'am ku ru ku
T02D1358:101b-27: ru sv'a h'a / aom w'a: badzra kro dha r'a
T02D1358:101b-28: dza aa tsa la a'i sha na di shi raksh'am
T02D1358:101b-29: ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:101b-30: aom r'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza ta kki nee
T02D1358:101b-31: ri ty'am di shi ra ksh'am ku ru ku ru
T02D1358:101b-32: sv'a h'a / aom h'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza
T02D1358:101b-33: n'i la da nda aa gne yam de shi raksh'am
T02D1358:101b-34: ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:101b-35: aom h'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza sum bha aa
T02D1358:101b-36: dho di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1358:101b-37: / zhes pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams ni /
T02D1358:101b-38: rgyud kyi sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i cho gas sngags pas dgod par bya'o //
T02D1358:101b-39: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a raksh'am tsakra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D1358:101b-40: zhes brjod la nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1358:101b-41: 'di ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga'o //
T02D1358:101b-42: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas bdag nyid
T02D1358:101b-43: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor
T02D1358:101b-44: lo / zhal dang phyag dang bzhugs tshul rnams su skad cig gis bsams la /
T02D1358:101b-45: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar bdag nyid skad cig gis lha'i skur bsgoms nas /
T02D1358:101b-46: rang gi snying gar pam yig yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1358:101b-47: de'i lte ba'i steng du aam yig yongs su gyur
T02D1358:101b-48: pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su de
T02D1358:101b-50: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa de
T02D1358:101b-51: las kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro
T02D1358:101b-52: ba rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:101b-53: de'i 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa'i sngon du
T02D1358:101b-54: gsungs pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1358:101b-56: nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la /
T02D1358:102a-2: sgrub thabs kyi tshig rab tu bsdus par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1358:102a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rjes su bsgrub
T02D1358:102a-4: pa'i phyir phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams
T02D1358:102a-5: 'di lta ste / sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras
T02D1358:102a-6: khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams dang ni de rnams
T02D1358:102a-7: 'di lta ste / kyi // lha mo'i tshogs dang
T02D1358:102a-8: rgyas 'debs bdag dang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams la
T02D1358:102a-10: gang zhig brjod par 'gyur pa'i zhal gyi grangs rnams
T02D1358:102a-11: g-yas skor gyis ni go bya ste //
T02D1358:102a-12: g-yas dang g-yon gyi rtsa ba'i phyag na chu skyes dang ni rang mtshan go bar bya //
T02D1358:102a-13: sna tshogs padma zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus me 'phrog byed zhal gcig kha dog dkar //
T02D1358:102a-14: rig byed phyag na rtse gsum da ma ru dang dpal gyi dung dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1358:102a-15: rtse mo can gyi mig ldan g-yon du gan rgyal bsgyel ba gnas te g-yas su dran pa nyid //
T02D1358:102a-16: kha dog dmar po mda' lnga lcags kyu gzhu dang zhags pa rnams dang bcas pa de dag la //
T02D1358:102a-17: goo r'i dga' byed ma yis bzung ba dkar dang dmar ba'i g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis snying gar mnan //
T02D1358:102a-18: sa bon h'um yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i ral ba'i thor tshugs sngon po can //
T02D1358:102a-19: mi bskyod pa ste zhal gyi padma sprin dang pa
T02D1358:102a-20: la 'od ldan ri bong can rnams rgya mtsho mtshungs
T02D1358:102a-21: // dbus dang g-yas dang g-yon rnams sngon po dmar
T02D1358:102a-22: po dkar po rnams dang ldan pa'i mgrin gsum pa
T02D1358:102a-23: // // g-yon gyi dpung pa'i rim bzhin dkar min
T02D1358:102a-24: dmar dang dkar ba rnams te g-yas pa'i dpung ba
T02D1358:102a-25: // // gsum // de bzhin yin te bcom ldan
T02D1358:102a-26: 'das kyis lag ngar zung gsum phyag gi mgo bo
T02D1358:102a-27: // // gsum // zhi pa gsum // sor mo
T02D1358:102a-28: rnams ni gser dang zla ba nyi ma sprin dang
T02D1358:102a-29: // // gsum // zhi pa gsum // / ljang gu mthe ba sogs rim pa bzhin //
T02D1358:102a-30: de rnams rtse mo dbus dang rtsa ba rnams kyi tshigs ni sprin dang nyi ma thig le rnams /
T02D1358:102a-31: mi mgo skam po lnga rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pas nyid kyi dbu la brgyan //
T02D1358:102a-32: mgrin la mgul rgyan nyid dang sked la ska rags rna rgyan gyis ni rna ba la //
T02D1358:102a-33: lag pa dag la yid 'ong lag gdub rkang pa dag la rkang gdub mdzes pas spras //
T02D1358:102a-34: dbul dar dbyangs sku la thugs kar mchod phyir thogs pa rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1358:102a-35: so so'i zhal rnams spyan gsum dang ldan nor bu rdo rje zla ba dang //
T02D1358:102a-36: dbu nyid la ste mi mgo brgya yi phreng ba mgo 'dzin la gnas //
T02D1358:102a-37: stag gi sham thabs dang ldan rdo rje ral gri
T02D1358:102b-0: rtse @102b gsum gri gug / mda' dang lcags kyu
T02D1358:102b-1: cang te'u thod pa 'khor lo dung rnams dang ni
T02D1358:102b-2: // dbyug pa dgra sta g-yas min rnams te dril bu phub chung dag ste //
T02D1358:102b-3: kha tv'am ga dang dung dang thod pa mda' gnas zhags pa rin chen //
T02D1358:102b-4: chu skyes dang ni dung dang mchog gi me long lcags sgrog rnams dang //
T02D1358:102b-5: rigs byed gdod ldan mgo bo rnams kyi phyag nyid rnams la mtshan pa //
T02D1358:102b-6: phrem yig gri gug las byung bud med gzugs can sku mdog ser mo //
T02D1358:102b-7: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las gzhan bzhugs pas rab tu 'khyud pa //
T02D1358:102b-8: phyag rgya dang ldan klu yi phyag gis padma sna tshogs yum gyi //
T02D1358:102b-9: dbul dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan la gnas //
T02D1358:102b-10: gri gug lcags kyu cang te'u phreng ba rnams ni rim pa bzhin du //
T02D1358:102b-11: thod pa zhags pa chu skyes rin chen rnams ni phyag gis 'dzin ma //
T02D1358:102b-12: gser dang zla ba dang ni sprin dang nyi ma rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1358:102b-13: gang zhig zhal bzhi rnams ni me yi spyan dang rab tu ldan ma //
T02D1358:102b-14: aam yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' gang zhig ye shes rnam dag pa //

T02D1358:108b-13: bdud rtsi'i bum pa rdo rje chu skyes rin chen phyag rnams kun gyis //
T02D1358:108b-14: bzung ba rkang g-yon mthe chung rnam par dag pa sngon mo dang bcas //
T02D1358:108b-15: steng du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:108b-16: sgo 'gram rnams su g-yo ba'i rtse mo can dang
T02D1358:108b-17: chu dang sa rnams dkyil 'khor so so'i kha dog
T02D1358:108b-18: gis // shar la sogs pa'i g-yon du dgod pa
T02D1358:108b-19: hya yig rgyal mtshan las byung karko ta nyid nag
T02D1358:108b-20: gis // po ni // ming med rnam par dag
T02D1358:108b-21: pa ca spyang gdong mas 'khyud dang hram yig bkra
T02D1358:108b-22: shis las byung chu bdag nyid //
T02D1358:108b-23: nyi ma dang mtshungs gung mo rnam par dag pa
T02D1358:108b-24: stag gdong ma dang bcas la rim bzhin phyag 'tshal
T02D1358:108b-25: lo // hva yig chu skyes las byung dga' bo dkar po nyid //
T02D1358:108b-26: mdzub mo rnam par dag pa phag gdong mas 'khyud dang //
T02D1358:108b-27: hla yig 'khor lo las byung 'jog po ser po nyid //
T02D1358:108b-28: mthe bo rnam dag khyi gdong dang bcas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:108b-29: nub sogs g-yas su hl'a yig 'khor lo las byung padma chen po ser po khva gdong bcas //
T02D1358:108b-30: h'a yig dag ni padma dag las byung ba'i rigs ldan dkar po bya rgod gdong bcas dang //
T02D1358:108b-31: hr'a yig bkra shis las byung ltos 'gro dung skyong dmar po 'ug gdong ma dang bcas pa dang //
T02D1358:109a-0: hy'a yig rgyal mtshan las byung padma dkar min bya khyung gdong bcas rnams @109a * //
T02D1358:109a-2: kshum yig rdo rje las byung rnam rgyal sngon po nyid //
T02D1358:109a-3: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa nyid kyi //
T02D1358:109a-4: rnam par dag pa rdo rje mig ma dang bcas pa //
T02D1358:109a-5: 'og tu ye shes la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1358:109a-6: lho sgo'i g-yon gyi 'dod yon la ni nges par
T02D1358:109a-7: gsal byed ka kha ga gha nga rnams thig le
T02D1358:109a-8: dang // bcas pa'i sa bon las byung mi 'dod
T02D1358:109a-9: ma rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste mda' yi
T02D1358:109a-10: dang // grangs rnams so // shar la sogs pa'i
T02D1358:109a-11: g-yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la tsa ta pa ta'i
T02D1358:109a-12: sde tshan rnams las rab tu byung //
T02D1358:109a-13: de ltar de rnams so so'i phyogs la lnga yi
T02D1358:109a-14: grangs kyi sa bon dang bcas so so'i phyag mtshan
T02D1358:109a-15: no // de ltar sa sde'i shar gyi g-yon //
T02D1358:109a-16: 'dod yon la ste ha ste byang //
T02D1358:109a-17: de las gzhan pa ksha yig las //
T02D1358:109a-18: byung ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1358:109a-19: 'khor lo la gnas lha nyid de rnams ma lus pa //
T02D1358:109a-20: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste spyan gsum dang ldan ma //
T02D1358:109a-21: phyag rgyas spras shing skra grol na bza' rnams dang bral //
T02D1358:109a-22: dpal gyi mgo bo'i phreng ba'i gri gug thod pa'i
T02D1358:109a-23: phyag / h'a yig gri gug las byung rdo rje
T02D1358:109a-24: spyan ma nyid // ljang gu rgyan dang bcas pa
T02D1358:109a-25: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi / rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1358:109a-26: sku mnga' steng gi phyogs nyid du //
T02D1358:109a-27: rkang brgyad 'khor lo ljang gu la ni gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1358:109a-28: gang gi me dang rlung dkyil 'khor lo dag gi dbus kyi cha //
T02D1358:109a-29: ka sde brtsegs pa dang ni gri gug las byung khyi gdong ma //
T02D1358:109a-30: nag mo 'jog po dang ni bcas pa lha yi dbang po'i phyogs su //
T02D1358:109a-31: ral gri can dang 'khor lo dmar po la ni gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:109a-32: de bzhin ksha ya r'a wa la dang //
T02D1358:109a-33: gri gug las byung phag gdong dmar mo //
T02D1358:109a-34: dga' bo dang bcas lho yi phyogs su //
T02D1358:109a-35: dom dang 'khor lo gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:109a-36: de bzhin ha ya ra wa la dang //
T02D1358:109a-37: gri gug las byung stag gdong dkar mo //
T02D1358:109a-38: chu bdag dang bcas byang gi phyogs su //
T02D1358:109a-39: g-yag dang 'khor lor gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:109a-40: de bzhin thka sha sha wa sa dang //
T02D1358:109a-41: gri gug las byung ce spyang gdong ma //
T02D1358:109a-42: ser mo karko ta bcas nub tu //
T02D1358:109a-43: seng ge 'khor lor gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:109a-44: tu pu tu tsu rnams dang gri gug las byung
T02D1358:109b-0: bya yi dbang po 'ug pa @109b bya rgod khva
T02D1358:109b-1: rnams dang // mtshungs pa'i gdong can ser mo dkar
T02D1358:109b-2: mo dmar mo nag mo rnams ni padma dung skyong
T02D1358:109b-3: rnams dang // dga' bo dang // padma chen po
T02D1358:109b-4: dang bcas rlung dang 'phrog byed ster byed me mtshams
T02D1358:109b-5: rnams su shing rta'i tshogs bcom nas //
T02D1358:109b-6: longs spyod pa yi bzhon pa mig sngon bya long
T02D1358:109b-7: bhe dunda dang 'khor lo dkar po gnas la phyag
T02D1358:109b-8: 'tshal // ha: yig gri gug las byung sngon mo kha dog sngo //
T02D1358:109b-9: rgyal ba dang bcas 'og tu rlung dang 'khor lo nyid //
T02D1358:109b-10: sngon po la gnas phyag 'tshal sngon ltar dgu po yang //
T02D1358:109b-11: lag pa g-yas g-yon sor mo rnam dag lha mo //
T02D1358:109b-12: aa yig las byung zla ba dbang po'i phyogs gnas //
T02D1358:109b-13: aa: las byung ba'i snang byed bden bral la gnas //
T02D1358:109b-14: de dag sa yi dkyil 'khor gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:109b-15: h'um yig dang ni aam yig aom yig ho: rnams las byung ba yi //
T02D1358:109b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo dpal gyi bum pa bzang po mchog gi rnga dang //
T02D1358:109b-17: dpag bsam shing rnams dkar min dmar po dkar po ser po rnams ni //
T02D1358:109b-18: rim bzhin shar la sogs pa'i rta babs la gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1358:109b-19: rgyal ba mi bskyod pa la dpal ldan rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpas rgyas ni gdab par bya //
T02D1358:109b-20: de ni rgyal ba mi bskyod pa ste don grub rgyal ba nor bu'i phyag ldan de nyid kyis //
T02D1358:109b-21: chu skyes phyag ldan de nyid 'khor lo can no yang ni de yi rgyal ba rnams par shes //
T02D1358:109b-22: spyi bo la gnas sgrib pa bral ba so so'i phyag rgya mdzad la dang bas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1358:109b-23: nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang sreg byed chu dang sa yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1358:109b-24: sngon du gsungs pa'i khams rnams las byung bde bar gshegs pa ji lta bu //
T02D1358:109b-25: de bzhin 'khor lo 'di las gzhan pa'i lha rnams ma lus pa nyid kyi //
T02D1358:109b-26: con pan mchog las yang dag gnas pa de rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1358:109b-27: de ltar phyag btsal nas mchod pa bya ba ni //
T02D1358:109b-28: de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dod pa'i dri ma med par gsungs pa ltar //
T02D1358:109b-29: de las rgyal ba ma lus mchod pa'i don du
T02D1358:109b-30: spros pa'i 'od zer de rnams slar bkug ste rang
T02D1358:109b-31: gi snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje la zhugs par
T02D1358:109b-32: bsam par bya'o // de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1358:109b-33: la mchod pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis kyi sa bon
T02D1358:109b-34: gyi yi ge rnams bsams la /
T02D1358:109b-35: de nas so so'i sa bon las mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros pa ni /
T02D1358:110a-1: tstshdzdzhnya badzra gandhe gandha aa rtsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'ah'a /
T02D1358:110a-2: aom tstshadzdzhny'a ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-3: aom tathaddhan'a tathddhana badzra dh'u pe dh'u pa aa tsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-4: aom tathddhn'a badzra pra d'i pe pra d'i pa aa tsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-5: aom phagbham badzra aa mri te nee be dya p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-6: aom papbbham'a badzra aaksha te aaksha ta pha la aa rtsa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-7: aom tathaddha badzra l'a sye bastra a'a bha ra na p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sva h'a /
T02D1358:110a-8: aom tathddhana badzra h'a sye gha nt'a da rsha p'u dz'a ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-9: badzra w'a dye p'u dz'a ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-10: aom kkhagghd'a badzra nri tyam nri tya p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-11: aom swashshyka badzra g'i ti g'i ta p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:110a-12: aom swshshthk'a badzra k'a me sarba buddha bo dhi satva
T02D1358:110a-13: n'am kro dh'a aa dhi n'am tse ba badzra su
T02D1358:110a-14: ra ta p'u dz'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a
T02D1358:110a-15: / de ltar sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyis sangs
T02D1358:110a-16: rgyas la sogs pa rnams la yid kyis mchod par
T02D1358:110a-17: / bya'o // de nas sdig ba bshags pa ni sdig pa dpag med byas pa rnams //
T02D1358:110a-18: so so nyid du bshags par bgyi //
T02D1358:110a-19: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni /
T02D1358:110a-20: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i
T02D1358:110a-21: dge 'dun rnams kyi dge ba dpag med gang byas
T02D1358:110a-22: pa // de rnams kun la rjes su yi rang
T02D1358:110a-23: ba dang sdig bral byang chub spyod la rjes su
T02D1358:110a-24: pa // bzhugs par zhu // de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni /
T02D1358:110a-25: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs pa
T02D1358:110a-26: 'joms pa rnams la byang chub bar du skyabs su
T02D1358:110a-27: 'chi // de nas bdag nyid dbul ba dang bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba ni /
T02D1358:110a-28: bdag gi ji srid len gyur lus 'bul sems can
T02D1358:110a-29: ma lus don phyir bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1358:110a-30: shog / de ltar bdun rnam par dag pa'i mchod
T02D1358:110a-31: pa byas nas / de nas rtsa ba gsum dran par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-32: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-33: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-34: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-35: mi dge pa bcu yongs su spong ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-36: sgrib pa lnga spong ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-37: nyon mongs pa bzhi spong ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-38: zag pa bzhi spang ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110a-39: rnam par thar pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:110b-0: @110b de ltar bsgom pa la khams gsum g-yo ba
T02D1358:110b-1: dang brtan par bcas pa rnams rnam par dpyad par
T02D1358:110b-2: bya ste // dngos med dngos por med pa ste //
T02D1358:110b-3: de ltar dngos po'ang dngos por med //
T02D1358:110b-4: des na dngos po dngos med 'gyur //
T02D1358:110b-5: de phyir dngos po dmigs su med //
T02D1358:110b-7: de nas 'khor ba'i phung po yongs su spang bar bya ste /
T02D1358:110b-8: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar dang por
T02D1358:110b-9: 'dir brtul zhugs dang ldan pas lus kyi dbus su
T02D1358:110b-10: chu yis me rnams bshig bar byed pa'o //
T02D1358:110b-11: de nas me'i dngos po med pa las sa'i sra ba spangs nas tshva bzhin du zhu ste /
T02D1358:110b-13: de nas yang chu rnams rlung gis bskams te nam mkha' la thim par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1358:110b-14: de ltar khams kyi tshogs rnams myur bar rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1358:110b-16: sems dang me nyid mun pa'i mtha' //
T02D1358:110b-17: zhes pa ni nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus kyi gnas so //
T02D1358:110b-18: yul dang bral ba zhes pa ni rnam pa thams
T02D1358:110b-19: cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun gzhi rnam par shes par
T02D1358:110b-21: de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1358:110b-22: aom sh'u nya t'a dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1358:110b-23: aom aa ni mitta dzny'ana badzra sva a'atma konya ham /
T02D1358:110b-24: aom aa pra ni hi ta dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1358:110b-25: aom aa n'a bhi sam sak'a ra dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1358:110b-27: khams gsum po rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'i stong pa'i rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1358:110b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam yongs
T02D1358:110b-29: su rdzogs nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
T02D1358:110b-30: ba'i don du mngal du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bskyed
T02D1358:110b-31: pa ni / nam mkha'i khams dpag pa las 'das
T02D1358:110b-32: pa bltas la sngon du brjod pa'i rlung la sogs
T02D1358:110b-33: pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi la sogs pa bsam mo /
T02D1358:110b-34: hkshmlwr+yam de nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus su gzhal yas khang bsam pa ni /
T02D1358:110b-35: bh'um yig gam aom yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1358:110b-36: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag
T02D1358:110b-37: nyid gru bzhi pa'i rten bsam par bya'o //
T02D1358:110b-38: de yang thugs kyi 'khor lo la rab nag po
T02D1358:110b-39: dang dmar po dang dkar po gsum gyis bskor bsgo
T02D1358:110b-40: bzhi pa kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rta
T02D1358:110b-52: rnga yab la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D1358:111a-1: nang gi phyed ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1358:111a-2: rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba ka ba bcu drug gis spras pa'o //
T02D1358:111a-3: de nyid kyi phyed ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas te rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1358:111a-4: de ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1358:111a-5: de'i nyis 'gyur gsung gi 'khor lo rab lnga yis bskor ba'o //
T02D1358:111a-6: de ltar nyis 'gyur gyi sgo bzhi la sogs pa rnga yab kyi bar gyis mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02D1358:111a-7: de'i phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo la de nyid nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis te /
T02D1358:111a-8: rab lnga dang sgo bzhi la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02D1358:111a-9: thams cad kyi shar dang me mtshams kyis gzhi nag po'o //
T02D1358:111a-10: lho dang bden bral gyis gzhi dmar po'o //
T02D1358:111a-11: nub dang rlung mtshams kyis gzhi ser po'o //
T02D1358:111a-12: byang dang dbang ldan gyi sa gzhi dkar po'o //
T02D1358:111a-13: phyi rol du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1358:111a-16: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i dur khrod chen po'o //
T02D1358:111a-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1358:111a-18: phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad par bshad pa'i bzhugs
T02D1358:111a-19: gnas rnams su gdan rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1358:111a-20: lha rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1358:111a-21: de rnams las thugs kyi 'khor lo la bam yig
T02D1358:111a-22: yongs su gyur pa las padma nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1358:111a-23: rnams la gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang
T02D1358:111a-25: padma re re la rtsa ba dang /
T02D1358:111a-29: lte ba rnams kyi sa bon rnams gzhung ches kyis dogs nas ma bris te /
T02D1358:111a-30: de yang gzhan cung zad tsam brjod pa ni /
T02D1358:111a-31: padma'i rtsa ba dang ra ba dag las aa yig las byung ba'o //
T02D1358:111a-32: 'dab ma dang ge sar dag au yig las byung ba'o //
T02D1358:111a-33: de'i dbus su lte ba la aa yig las zla ba'i gdan no //
T02D1358:111a-34: ram yig las nyi ma'i gdan no //
T02D1358:111a-35: de nas gtso bo'i padma nyi ma nyi shu rtsa
T02D1358:111a-36: lnga pa aom yig yongs su gyur pa las te
T02D1358:111a-40: dus me'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang bcas pa bsgom par byas nas /
T02D1358:111a-41: rdo rje shugs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi skabs su
T02D1358:111a-42: bshad pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes la
T02D1358:111a-43: sogs pa ye shes lnga rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1358:111a-44: phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D1358:111a-45: ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo de
T02D1358:111a-46: nyid du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sna
T02D1358:111b-0: tshogs yum gyis 'khyud par bdag @111b nyed bsams la
T02D1358:111b-1: / nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad dang /
T02D1358:111b-2: rin po che la sogs pa'i mtshan ma blta bar
T02D1358:111b-3: byas pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'o
T02D1358:111b-4: // de nas sbyor ba'i sgra mi bskyod pa la
T02D1358:111b-5: sogs pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams bdag nyid kyi lus
T02D1358:111b-7: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i tshogs skyes bu dang rig ma dang /
T02D1358:111b-9: yul rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi lha nyid du bskyed do //
T02D1358:111b-10: yang de rnams rang gi lus las phyung ste //
T02D1358:111b-11: sna tshogs yum la ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1358:111b-12: de nas yang de ltar spros la dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1358:111b-13: 'khor lo'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang
T02D1358:111b-15: rang gi rdo rje las spros te rang gi rig ma'i padma'i dbus so //
T02D1358:111b-16: de yongs su gyur pa las lha nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rten dang rten pa ste /
T02D1358:111b-17: lhag pa'i gtso bor mi bskyod pa bsams nas /
T02D1358:111b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gzhug par bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1358:111b-19: de nas sngar gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
T02D1358:111b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid la gnas par byas nas
T02D1358:111b-21: / de nas aom su bi shuddha dharm'a dh'a tu dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1358:111b-23: de nas sems can thams cad la snying rjes dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1358:111b-24: de yang de nyid las 'di ltar gsungs pa /
T02D1358:111b-25: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo la ye shes
T02D1358:111b-26: lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can
T02D1358:111b-27: / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1358:111b-28: de nas 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas nas sems can thams cad bkug ste /
T02D1358:111b-29: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs par rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1358:111b-30: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de
T02D1358:111b-31: bzhin gshegs pa'i khams rnams dang bcas pa rnams rang
T02D1358:111b-33: byang chub sems su zhu ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa /
T02D1358:111b-34: rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje nas spros pa'i byang chub sems des /
T02D1358:111b-35: sems can thams cad la dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1358:111b-36: de nas byang chub sems kyi 'od zer de rnams reg pas /
T02D1358:111b-37: zhal gsum pa dang zhal sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1358:111b-38: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha'i rang bzhin thabs dang
T02D1358:111b-39: shes rab kyi bdag nyid mchog tu gyur pa dga'
T02D1358:111b-40: ba'i bde bas gang bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1358:111b-41: de nas de rnams rang rang ge lus kyi dkyil
T02D1358:111b-42: 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du skad cig gis
T02D1358:112a-1: de nas sngags kyi sa bon rnams gsal byed sna
T02D1358:112a-2: tshogs 'dus pa dang dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams te
T02D1358:112a-3: / 'dir gsal byed thams cad 'dus pa ksha yig go //
T02D1358:112a-4: de nyid kyis gzhan yang shes par byed pas /
T02D1358:112a-5: gang dang gang gi ming gi yi ge dang po de gsal byed de /
T02D1358:112a-6: de ltar thams cad go bar bya'o //
T02D1358:112a-9: zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1358:112a-10: de ltar ksh'a ksh'i kshr'i ksh'u kshl'i ksh'am /
T02D1358:112a-11: zhes pa ni rna ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug go //
T02D1358:112a-12: de ltar ksh'a kshee kshr'a kshoo kshl'a ksh'a:/
T02D1358:112a-13: zhes pa ni yul drug go //
T02D1358:112a-14: de ltar kshha kshya kshra kshba kshla /
T02D1358:112a-15: zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po lnga ste /
T02D1358:112a-16: de ltar khro mo rnams so //
T02D1358:112a-17: de ltar kshh'a kshy'a kshr'a kshp'a kshl'a zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po lnga'i yul lo //
T02D1358:112a-18: de ltar sems can thams cad mtshan bzang po sum
T02D1358:112a-19: cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen por
T02D1358:112a-20: gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par skad
T02D1358:112a-21: cig gis rdzogs par bya ba ni /
T02D1358:112a-22: sems can thams cad la snying rjes dbang bskur ba
T02D1358:112a-23: byin la rang rang gi zhing la gshegs par bya
T02D1358:112a-24: zhes so // sku rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1358:112a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang bsnyen pa'i
T02D1358:112a-26: zhes so // yan lag go // de nas zhu ba la gnas pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1358:112a-27: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1358:112a-28: lte ba dang gtsug tor dag las ho yig go //
T02D1358:112a-29: 'di gnyis ka dbus su dgod pa dpral bar sku rdo rje aom yig go //
T02D1358:112a-30: mgrin par gsung rdo rje a'a: yig go //
T02D1358:112a-31: snying gar thugs rdo rje h'um yig go //
T02D1358:112a-32: de ltar yi ge gsum ni /
T02D1358:112a-33: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1358:112a-34: de ltar gzhan yang gsungs pa lte ba'i ho yig
T02D1358:112a-35: gi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis bzhu ba ni
T02D1358:112a-36: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis bde mnyam
T02D1358:112a-37: padmar shes rab kyi chags pa zhu ba'i ri bong
T02D1358:112a-38: can bzhin du khyab bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shes
T02D1358:112a-39: rab dang bcas pa zhu bar gnas pa las /
T02D1358:112a-40: sgrol ma la sogs pas bskul bas te /
T02D1358:112a-41: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:112a-45: btang snyoms rnams kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1358:112a-49: spyan ma ste lha mo rnams kyis bskul zhes pa'o //
T02D1358:112a-50: gzhan yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang de ltar gsungs pa /
T02D1358:112b-0: spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i @112b yum //
T02D1358:112b-1: rgyu mthun rnal 'byor la gnas pa //
T02D1358:112b-2: bdag ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor las //
T02D1358:112b-4: m'a ma k'i bdag sring mo ste //
T02D1358:112b-5: rnam smin rnal 'byor la gnas pa //
T02D1358:112b-6: bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin las //
T02D1358:112b-8: gos dkar mo bdag bu mo ste //
T02D1358:112b-9: skyes bu'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa //
T02D1358:112b-10: bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin las //
T02D1358:112b-12: sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste //
T02D1358:112b-13: bral ba'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa //
T02D1358:112b-14: bdag ni dkyil 'khor rang bzhin pas //
T02D1358:112b-16: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas la //
T02D1358:112b-17: 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs dgongs kyis //
T02D1358:112b-18: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1358:112b-19: 'gro ba'i mgon pos spro bar mdzod //
T02D1358:112b-21: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:112b-22: 'dir bcom ldan 'das stong par bzhugs pa glus rab tu sad nas /
T02D1358:112b-23: 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams sgyu ma bzhin du bltas te /
T02D1358:112b-24: yang skyed par mdzad ces pas so //
T02D1358:112b-25: de nas de ltar rang gis bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1358:112b-26: rdzogs pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa bsam ste /
T02D1358:112b-29: glu rnams dgod pa'i sngags rnams spangs nas /
T02D1358:112b-30: sngar gsungs pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa dgod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1358:112b-31: de nas nang gi rgyas gdab pa dgod par bya ba ni /
T02D1358:112b-32: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:112b-33: 'dir gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor thig le la aa yig las mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1358:112b-34: de ltar snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la ai yig las don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1358:112b-35: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la au yig las 'od dpag med do zhes pa ste /
T02D1358:112b-36: mi mnyam pa'i rigs rnams mi mnyam pa'i 'khor lor ro //
T02D1358:112b-37: de ltar lte bar dus me la li yig las rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1358:112b-38: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ri yig las rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1358:112b-39: gsang par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la aam yig las rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o //
T02D1358:112b-40: de ltar lha rnams kyi rgyas gdab pa ni lus kyi rgyas gdab par nges pa'o //
T02D1358:112b-41: yang dag gi rgyas gdab pa ni lte bar l'i yig go //
T02D1358:113a-1: ste sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsam mo //
T02D1358:113a-2: de ltar sems kyi thig les rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D1358:113a-3: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aom yig go //
T02D1358:113a-4: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la a'a: yig go //
T02D1358:113a-5: snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la h'um yig go //
T02D1358:113a-6: lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor la ho: yig go //
T02D1358:113a-7: de ltar ye shes kyis rgyas gdab pa ni //
T02D1358:113a-8: chos thams cad byed pa dang bral ba'i sgo can /
T02D1358:113a-9: thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i bdag nyid /
T02D1358:113a-10: rdo rje nor bur aa yig grub pa'o //
T02D1358:113a-11: de nas aom su bi shuddha dharm'a dh'a tu dzny'ana badzra sva bh'a ba a'atmako& ham /
T02D1358:113a-12: zhes pa brjod la dkyil 'khor las dbyung ba'o //
T02D1358:113a-13: yang de nyid las gsungs pa //
T02D1358:113a-14: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge
T02D1358:113a-15: 'dzin gyi nam mkha' la gnas pa'i phung po dang
T02D1358:113a-16: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D1358:113a-17: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi don du sangs rgyas
T02D1358:113a-18: lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rang gi lus la
T02D1358:113a-19: bcug la shes rab kyi padmar so so'i sngags kyi
T02D1358:113a-21: de nas padma nas snga ma ltar zhal dang /
T02D1358:113a-22: phyag dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid can /
T02D1358:113a-26: sku'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya zhes pa ste /
T02D1358:113a-27: de ltar dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1358:113a-28: de nas snying ga'i padma'i lte ba la ri bong can dang nyi ma dang /
T02D1358:113a-29: rtse mo can rnams las h'um yig las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02D1358:113a-30: nag po 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro bzhin pa bsams la /
T02D1358:113a-31: rdo rje de nyid kyi lte ba'i dbus su dza:
T02D1358:113a-32: yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D1358:113a-33: bsam par bya'o // rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid
T02D1358:113a-34: las sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
T02D1358:113a-35: rdo rje shugs yan lag brgyad pa'i shing rta la
T02D1358:113a-36: gnas pa 'od zer rdo rje lcags kyu'i rnam pa
T02D1358:113a-37: can gyi rdo rje shugs yang dag par spro bar
T02D1358:113a-38: bsam par bya'o // byas pas / sngon du yang
T02D1358:113a-39: dag par grub pa'i khams gsum rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1358:113a-40: ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs nas /
T02D1358:113a-41: de nas rdo rje shugs rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o //
T02D1358:113a-45: shin tu stobs can te khro bo bzhi rnams kyi 'gugs pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1358:113a-46: yang de nyid las gsungs pa de ltar rnam par shes pa lngas te /
T02D1358:113a-47: dza: yig gis dgug pa dang /
T02D1358:113a-48: h'um yig gis gzhug pa dang /
T02D1358:113a-49: bam yig gis bcing ba dang /
T02D1358:113b-0: ho: yig gis @113b dgyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1358:113b-1: hi yig gis ro mnyam par byas nas /
T02D1358:113b-6: rdo rje dbyug pa rnams kyis zhes pa'o //
T02D1358:113b-7: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo la yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1358:113b-8: sngon ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ro gcig
T02D1358:113b-9: tu gyur par bsgom par bya ba ni nges pa'o
T02D1358:113b-10: // phan tshun rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D1358:113b-11: phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad par gsungs pa'i rim pa ltar sgom pa ste /
T02D1358:113b-12: 'di ni lha nyid kyi sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1358:113b-13: de nas sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1358:113b-14: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:113b-15: dpral bar aom yig yongs su gyur pa las zla
T02D1358:113b-16: ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du aom yig yongs su
T02D1358:113b-17: gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D1358:113b-18: de yongs su gyur pa las sku rdo rje kha dog dkar po zhal gsum pa /
T02D1358:113b-19: rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g-yon dmar po g-yas nag po phyag drug pa /
T02D1358:113b-21: padma dang rdo rje rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D1358:113b-22: g-yon pa ral gri dang dril bu dang nor bu rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D1358:113b-23: shes rab dang bcas pa dpral ba nas spros te /
T02D1358:113b-24: des nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D1358:113b-25: sku rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos bstan par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1358:113b-26: slar log ste bdag nyid kyi sngon du bzhugs pa la rang dbang du blang bar bya ba ni /
T02D1358:113b-27: sku rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur //
T02D1358:113b-29: de nas sku'i rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bus pas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1358:113b-30: de nas byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni /
T02D1358:113b-31: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sku rdo rje bcug nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02D1358:113b-32: dpal ldan sku yi rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1358:113b-33: bdag ni byin rlabs gnas yin pas //
T02D1358:113b-34: mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par //
T02D1358:113b-35: myur bar sku yi rdo rje mdzod //
T02D1358:113b-36: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1358:113b-37: bdag ni byin rlabs gnas yin pas //
T02D1358:113b-38: mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par //
T02D1358:113b-39: myur bar sku yi rdo rje mdzod //
T02D1358:113b-40: ces pa ni sku byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1358:113b-41: de ltar mgrin par ri yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1358:113b-42: de'i steng du aa yig yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D1358:113b-43: de yongs su gyur pa las gsung rdo rje dmar
T02D1358:113b-44: po shes rab dang bcas pa zhal dmar po dang
T02D1358:113b-45: dkar po dang nag po rnams so //
T02D1358:114a-1: kyis padma dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D1358:114a-2: g-yon gyis rin po che dang dril bu dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa spros la /
T02D1358:114a-3: ma mkha'i khams ma lus pa yongs su gyur pa gang bar rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D1358:114a-4: gsung rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1358:114a-5: slar log ste bdag nyid kyi sngon du bzhugs pa la dbang rab tu blang bar bya ba ni /
T02D1358:114a-6: gsung rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur //
T02D1358:114a-8: de nas gsung gi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsgoms nas /
T02D1358:114a-9: gsung byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni /
T02D1358:114a-10: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gsung rdo rje bcug nas 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02D1358:114a-11: dpal ldan gsung gi rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1358:114a-12: bdag ni byin rlabs gnas yin pas //
T02D1358:114a-13: mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par //
T02D1358:114a-14: myur bar gsung gi rdo rje mdzod //
T02D1358:114a-15: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1358:114a-16: bdag ni byin rlabs gnas yin pas //
T02D1358:114a-17: mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par //
T02D1358:114a-18: myur bar gsung gi rdo rje mdzod //
T02D1358:114a-19: ces pa ni gsung byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1358:114a-20: de ltar snying gar thig le yongs su gyur pa las sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1358:114a-21: de'i steng du h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o //
T02D1358:114a-22: de nyid yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1358:114a-23: thugs rdo rje sngon po shes rab dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1358:114a-24: zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po rnams so //
T02D1358:114a-25: g-yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D1358:114a-26: g-yon rnams kyis dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa /
T02D1358:114a-27: de spros te nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas /
T02D1358:114a-28: thugs rdo rjes 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1358:114a-29: slar log ste bdag nyid kyi sngon du zhugs pa la dbang blang bar bya ba ni /
T02D1358:114a-30: thugs rdo rje 'dzin bdag dbang bskur //
T02D1358:114a-32: de nas thugs kyi rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsams nas /
T02D1358:114a-33: thugs byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni /
T02D1358:114a-34: thugs kar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor la thugs rdo rje bcug nas /
T02D1358:114a-36: dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1358:114a-37: bdag ni byin rlabs gnas yin pas //
T02D1358:114a-38: mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob pas //
T02D1358:114a-39: myur bar thugs kyi rdo rje mdzod //
T02D1358:114b-0: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i @114b sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1358:114b-1: bdag ni byin rlabs gnas yin pas //
T02D1358:114b-2: mi phyed rdo rje gsum thob par //
T02D1358:114b-3: myur bar thugs kyi rdo rje mdzod //
T02D1358:114b-4: ces pas de ltar thugs rdo rje byin gyis brlabs
T02D1358:114b-5: par byas nas 'dir ro gcig tu bya ba ni
T02D1358:114b-6: / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ktsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atmako& ham /
T02D1358:114b-7: zhes pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas de ltar bya'o //
T02D1358:114b-8: de bzhin du shes rab kyi lta bar ho: yig gis so //
T02D1358:114b-9: gsang bar ha: yig gis so //
T02D1358:114b-10: spyi gtsug tu ham yig ste /
T02D1358:114b-11: thabs kyi khu ba'i chos dang rigs gsum mo //
T02D1358:114b-12: shes rab kyi rdul gyi chos dang rigs drug go zhes so //
T02D1358:114b-13: de nas 'dir gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ba ste /
T02D1358:114b-14: de yang dri ma med pa las gsungs pa //
T02D1358:114b-15: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa thams cad du lus rdzogs pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog go //
T02D1358:114b-16: ngag rdzogs pa ni las rgyal mchog ste /
T02D1358:114b-17: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1358:114b-18: byang chub sems kyi thig le'i rnal 'byor te /
T02D1358:114b-19: byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1358:114b-20: bde ba la dmigs pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te /
T02D1358:114b-21: de yang mi rnams kyi lo bcu drug gi mtha' ru'o //
T02D1358:114b-22: de'i phyir de'i longs spyod pa'i don du bag ma
T02D1358:114b-23: lan pa'i dus su lag pa gtod par byed pa
T02D1358:114b-24: dang / slob ma la slob dpon gyis shes rab ma gtod par byed pa'o //
T02D1358:114b-25: de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya de'i sgrub byed du /
T02D1358:114b-26: byis pa'i skye bo rnams la gsungs so //
T02D1358:114b-27: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni bar ma rnams la'o //
T02D1358:114b-28: phyag rgya chen mo ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa rnams la'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1358:114b-29: de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1358:114b-30: bcu drug lo ste rigs can ma //
T02D1358:114b-31: gzugs dang long tshes brgyan pa la //
T02D1358:114b-32: dang por shin tu bslab byas nas //
T02D1358:114b-33: dbang bskur bsgrub pa nas brtsams nas //
T02D1358:114b-34: sku gsung thugs su chags pa dang //
T02D1358:114b-35: dpral ba la sogs rnams su dgod //
T02D1358:114b-36: sv'a h'a gsang ba gtsug tor du //
T02D1358:114b-37: de nas padma rnam sbyang bya //
T02D1358:114b-39: h'um las rdo rje dang ldan pas //
T02D1358:114b-40: de ltar rdo rje dang bcas pa //
T02D1358:114b-41: shes rab thabs kyi rgyud nyid do //
T02D1358:114b-42: h'um las bdag gi rdo rje nyid //
T02D1358:114b-43: rtse mo lnga par bsam par bya //
T02D1358:114b-45: aa yig las ni rab tu brtag / de ltar pad bcas rdo rje nyid //
T02D1358:114b-46: padma la ni gzhag par bya //
T02D1358:114b-47: h'um phat brjod cing rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1358:114b-48: mngal du rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyu //
T02D1358:115a-2: byang chub sems ni spro mi bya //
T02D1358:115a-3: khams gsum ba ni ma lus pa //
T02D1358:115a-4: sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1358:115a-5: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
T02D1358:115a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1358:115a-7: mig dang spyan ma la sogs pa //
T02D1358:115a-8: bsregs te ri bong can ham 'dzag / zhu ba'i chos can bdud rtsi nyid //
T02D1358:115a-9: thig le gzugs kyis 'dzag pas na //
T02D1358:115a-10: thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad //
T02D1358:115a-11: bcu drug phyad phyed thig le 'dzin //
T02D1358:115a-12: cha med cha las 'das pa ni //
T02D1358:115a-13: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'dzin //
T02D1358:115a-14: phra mo'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad //
T02D1358:115a-15: rgyu mthun la sogs steng du 'gro //
T02D1358:115a-16: dung can ma ni phyag rgya che //
T02D1358:115a-17: de ni gtum mor rab tu bstan //
T02D1358:115a-18: lte ba'i steng du g-yung mo ste //
T02D1358:115a-19: aa ba dh'u t'i mi snang ldan //
T02D1358:115a-20: 'od zer lnga yi rang bzhin srog / dkyil 'khor lnga ni rgyud phyed pa //
T02D1358:115a-21: sna rtser yungs kar tsam du bstan //
T02D1358:115a-22: de yang srog sdud pa ru brjod //
T02D1358:115a-23: khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i //
T02D1358:115a-24: srid pa gsum po yongs su shes //
T02D1358:115a-25: srog nyid 'gags pa de nyid kyang //
T02D1358:115a-26: g-yo dang mi g-yo yungs kar tsam //
T02D1358:115a-27: so sor sdud pas phyag rgya che //
T02D1358:115a-28: nam mkha' stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1358:115a-29: sna ldan de ni rab bstan pa //
T02D1358:115a-30: gang gis yid gnyis brtags pa yis //
T02D1358:115a-31: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa //
T02D1358:115a-32: mtshan ma'i mtha' ru ri mo gang //
T02D1358:115a-33: de yi gzugs ni g-yo mi g-yo //
T02D1358:115a-34: rnal 'byor bsam gtan la sogs pa //
T02D1358:115a-35: de rnams ma lus bsgom par bya //
T02D1358:115a-37: de yang 'dir drang ba'i don du /
T02D1358:115a-38: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1358:115a-39: lo'i rnam par spro zhing bsgom par shes par bya'o
T02D1358:115a-40: // de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:115a-41: khams gsum po lan cig gis 'gugs par byed ces pa ni /
T02D1358:115a-42: skad cig gis dus gsum mkhyen pa /
T02D1358:115a-44: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i lha'i rnam par spro ba'o //
T02D1358:115a-45: 'khor ba po rnams kyis kyang byang chub kyi sems las bu dang bu mo spro ba ste /
T02D1358:115a-46: de ltar lo bcu drug gi mthar mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi lus dang /
T02D1358:115a-47: ngag dang sems rnams rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1358:115a-48: lha rnams ni rnam par thar pa bzhi'i stobs kyis te /
T02D1358:115a-49: 'dir kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1358:115a-50: de dag las yang drang ba'i don du shes rab
T02D1358:115a-51: kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi sna'i rtse mo lus
T02D1358:115b-0: yungs kar la @115b sogs pa'i nges pa dang /
T02D1358:115b-1: 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa mngal du rgyu ba ste /
T02D1358:115b-2: de'i dbus su aom dzny'ana p'u dza aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tmako& ham /
T02D1358:115b-4: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:115b-5: lo bcu drug gi mtshams nas ye shes kyi mchod pa la rjes su chags pa de bzhin du /
T02D1358:115b-6: 'dir bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dus su yang de'i rang
T02D1358:115b-7: bzhin bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs par
T02D1358:115b-9: nges pa'i don du sngags bzlas pa ni srog mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
T02D1358:115b-10: dgang ba dang dbyung ba dang /
T02D1358:115b-11: bum pa can gyi sbyor ba la dus thams cad du bsnyen par byas pas /
T02D1358:115b-12: de nyid kyis lha'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02D1358:115b-14: ngag gi brjod pa dang bcas pas nges pa'i don la ma yin te /
T02D1358:115b-15: des na sgrub pa'i thabs kyi bye brag gi sbyor
T02D1358:115b-16: ba'i yan lag drug mdor bstan pa tsam las ma
T02D1358:115b-17: bris pa ni gzhung ches kyis dogs pa'o //
T02D1358:115b-18: drang don ltar na thun mong bsgrub pa'i don du phreng ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas pa ste /
T02D1358:115b-19: de yang zhib dang rgyas pa la phyogs pas mu tig gam shel gyi phreng ba dang bcas pas /
T02D1358:115b-21: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag drug gi sngags 'di lta ste /
T02D1358:115b-22: aom hr'am hr'im hum hl'im hr'am sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:115b-23: zhes pa'i sngags 'di'i mthar na mo bcug pas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1358:115b-24: de ltar lha rnams gshegs par bya ba ni ;
T02D1358:115b-25: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:115b-29: phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnams bsgoms nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D1358:115b-31: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D1358:115b-32: ces ba la sogs pas bstod nas /
T02D1358:115b-33: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1358:115b-34: gtsug tor du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms pa dang /
T02D1358:115b-35: de'i lte ba la bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1358:115b-36: de ltar snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa bsgoms pa dang /
T02D1358:115b-37: de'i lte ba la du ba ma la sogs pa rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1358:115b-38: de ltar dpral bar lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1358:115b-39: la rdo rje rtse mo bcu bdun pa bsgoms pa
T02D1358:115b-40: dang / de'i lte ba la phung po dang khams kyi lha rnams gshegs par bya'o //
T02D1358:115b-41: de ltar mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo la rdo
T02D1358:115b-42: rje rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa bsgoms pa
T02D1358:116a-0: dang / de'i lte ba la skye mched bcu @116a * //
T02D1358:116a-1: gnyis kyi lha khro bo rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1358:116a-2: de ltar lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo la rdo
T02D1358:116a-3: rje rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa bsgoms pa
T02D1358:116a-4: dang / de'i lte ba la tsa munda la sogs pa dang /
T02D1358:116a-5: 'jigs byed ma la sogs pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1358:116a-6: de ltar gsang bar rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1358:116a-7: de'i lte ba la 'od zer can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1358:116a-8: de ltar las kyi 'khor lo rnams la rdo rje
T02D1358:116a-9: rtse mo sum cu so gcig pa rnams bsgom pa
T02D1358:116a-10: dang / phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad par gsungs
T02D1358:116a-11: pa ltar khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i lha bcu gnyis
T02D1358:116a-13: de rnams kyi lte ba rnams la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1358:116a-14: de ltar las kyi 'khor lo rnam la rdo rje rtse mo bdun pa rnams bsgom pa dang /
T02D1358:116a-15: klu rnams dang khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i lha
T02D1358:116a-16: de rnams lte ba rnams la gshegs su gsol bar
T02D1358:116a-17: bya'o // de nas thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor
T02D1358:116a-18: lo rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1358:116a-19: lo bsgom par mi nus pa'i gang zag dbang po
T02D1358:116a-21: sngon du gsungs pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste /
T02D1358:116a-22: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:116a-23: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padma'i gdan la gnas pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad dang /
T02D1358:116a-25: chos kyi dung la sogs pa bzhin rnams sbangs pa ni /
T02D1358:116a-26: dpal ldan snying po'i 'khor lo ni thugs kyi dkyil
T02D1358:116a-27: 'khor gyi dbus su lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag
T02D1358:116a-29: mi'i bdag po kye zhes pa ni /
T02D1358:116a-30: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo bzhugs pa ste /
T02D1358:116a-31: de'i tshe dpal 'dus pa bzhin 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D1358:116a-32: 'dir nges pa med de rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
T02D1358:116a-33: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rang sems nus ma dang
T02D1358:116a-34: ldan pa 'dir yang shes par byas la rnal 'byor
T02D1358:116a-35: rnams kyi ni sgrub pa po rnams kyis bsgom par
T02D1358:116a-36: bya'o // dbang gi don du rigs kyi dbang las
T02D1358:116a-37: phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du
T02D1358:116a-38: bya'o // 'gyur ba'o // yang 'dir sngon du gsungs
T02D1358:116a-39: pa ltar lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag
T02D1358:116a-40: pa la sogs pa nas lha rnams gshegs pa'i bar
T02D1358:116a-42: der gshegs su gsol bar byas nas /
T02D1358:116a-43: de nas aom h'um phat ces pa'i nga rgyal byas pa dang /
T02D1358:116b-1: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:116b-2: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas mtshams gsum du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1358:116b-3: sngon du gsungs pa'i chogs dam tshig gi rdzas rnam par dag par byas la /
T02D1358:116b-4: lha'i tshogs rnams mnyes par bya ba'i don du gtor ma 'bul ba ni /
T02D1358:116b-6: rim par gnas pas dang po 'dir ni rtag tu dag bya sel bar bya ba dang //
T02D1358:116b-7: rab tu sbar bya nyid dang ri bong can zhu
T02D1358:116b-8: lta bu ma lus rim pas chang la bsgom byas
T02D1358:116b-9: la // snod de las ni nges par ri bong
T02D1358:116b-10: can gyi lag pa'i ming med rtse mos la thig
T02D1358:116b-11: la // le nyid // nyin phyed dang ni mtshungs
T02D1358:116b-12: pa'i dbus su zlum po yin te de yi phyi
T02D1358:116b-13: ru gru gsum byas pa la //
T02D1358:116b-14: de yi dbus su ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum
T02D1358:116b-15: la gnas pa yang sngags pa rnams kyis 'dir bsgoms
T02D1358:116b-16: nas // mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis ni
T02D1358:116b-17: nyi ma so so'i dus su tshim pa la sogs
T02D1358:116b-18: nas // bya ba ni // 'dir ni sngon du
T02D1358:116b-19: yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la dang po
T02D1358:116b-20: dbus mtha'i ming gis gtor ma dbul //
T02D1358:116b-21: 'phrog mal yang chad bu gnyis dang gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i ched du sngags pas gtor ma'o //
T02D1358:116b-22: pho nya rnams la zas kyi rtse mos stengs rnams
T02D1358:116b-23: su bzhag ste khyab bdag rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin
T02D1358:116b-24: // zos pa'i lhag ma 'byung po rnams la sbyin
T02D1358:116b-25: te gzhan yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs
T02D1358:116b-26: // bcad brjod // nyal ba'i dus su 'khrig pa'i
T02D1358:116b-27: mchod pa byas nas yan lag kha dang gnyis kyi
T02D1358:116b-29: rang gi mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang
T02D1358:116b-30: spyi bo'i 'khor lo rnams la rdo rje'i yan lag
T02D1358:116b-32: de nas aa yig las byung ba'i bum pa gsum mo //
T02D1358:116b-33: de rnams kyi steng du aom yig las byung ba'i thod pa'o //
T02D1358:116b-34: nang na gnas pa ni phung po dang khams kyi
T02D1358:116b-35: sa bon rnams las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lnga dang
T02D1358:116b-37: de rnams kyi 'og tu gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil
T02D1358:116b-38: 'khor gyis rab tu sbar ba'i mes bzhu bar bya'o
T02D1358:116b-39: // de nyid h'um yig las byung ba'i rdo rjes dkrug par bya'o //
T02D1358:116b-40: de dang bcas pa'i ro gcig tu gyur pas zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs su blta'o //
T02D1358:116b-41: de nas rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi rkang ba brjod pa /
T02D1358:116b-42: aom aom badzra tsandra sarba dha rmm'a su bi shuddha:/
T02D1358:116b-43: sva bh'a ba sarba dha rm'a na bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:116b-44: aom a'a: badzra s'u rya sarba dha rmm'a pra bo
T02D1358:116b-45: dha k'a sarba dharm'a na pra po dha ya sv'a
T02D1358:116b-46: h'a / aom h'um badzr'a na la sarba dha rmm'a
T02D1358:116b-47: pra d'i ba ka sarba dha rmm'am pra d'i pa
T02D1358:117a-1: dharmm'a badzr'a mri ta ka ra sarba dha rm'a na badzr'a mri tam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:117a-2: zhes pa rnams kyis lag pa g-yon pas rnam par dgab par bya ba dang /
T02D1358:117a-3: lag pa g-yas pas spel bar bya ba dang /
T02D1358:117a-4: thal mos kha bcad de reg pas rab tu sbar bar bya ba dang /
T02D1358:117a-5: rdo rje bya khyung gi phyag rgyas rdo rje bdud rtsir bya'o //
T02D1358:117a-6: gzhan yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D1358:117a-7: yul gyi bdag po spyan drang bar bya ba dang
T02D1358:117a-8: / khyi'i phyag rgyas grong gi bdag po rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-9: rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas khro bo'i rgyal po rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-10: gri gug gi phyag rgyas zad par rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-11: ral gri'i phyag rgyas lha rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-12: rin po che'i phyag rgyas gza' rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-13: padma'i phyag rgyas klu rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-14: 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'byung po rnams la'o //
T02D1358:117a-15: de yang aom a'a: h'um aa mu ka a'a gtstsha
T02D1358:117a-16: a'a gtstsha sh'i ghram ai dam ba lim grihan grihan
T02D1358:117a-17: bu ktv'a p'i tv'a tri ptam kri tv'a sarba stva
T02D1358:117a-18: n'am sh'anti tsittam kri tv'a aa pa ra sath'a nam
T02D1358:117a-20: zhes pa gtor ma'i sngags 'dis yul gyi bdag po dang /
T02D1358:117a-21: grong gi bdag po'am de ltar yul lam /
T02D1358:117a-22: grong gi ming gi yi ge gang yang rung ba gsum dang lnga dang bdun yin na /
T02D1358:117a-23: de yang ming gi yi ge dang po dang /
T02D1358:117a-24: dbus dang mtha' ma rnams bcug ste /
T02D1358:117a-26: gal te de gnyis dang bzhi dang /
T02D1358:117a-27: drug la sogs pa mnyam pa'i ming gi yi ge yin na /
T02D1358:117a-28: dang po dang mtha' ma bcug la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1358:117a-29: de nas sngon du spros pa'i khro bo la sogs pa rnams la bltas la //
T02D1358:117a-30: ji lta ba bzhin sngags kyi rkang pa rnams brjod la /
T02D1358:117a-31: aom a'a: h'um ho au shn'i sha sum bha ni
T02D1358:117a-32: sum bha bi ghan'am ta ka n'i la danda pra
T02D1358:117a-33: dzny'anta ka /takki r'a dz'a padm'a nta ka / aa
T02D1358:117a-35: ma h'a ba le bhya: sa pa ri w'a re
T02D1358:117a-36: bhya: ai dam ba lim gandham pushpam dh'u pam d'i
T02D1358:117a-39: te tsa a'a ga tya sa pa ri w'a re:/
T02D1358:117a-40: sh'i ghram ai dam ba lim grihanan tu /
T02D1358:117a-41: kh'a dantu: pi wantu dza: h'um bam ho: sam tri
T02D1358:117a-42: pt'a sarba stva nam sh'a ntim pu shtim raksha a'a
T02D1358:117a-43: ba ra na gu ptim ku rbntu h'um h'um phat
T02D1358:117a-44: badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a
T02D1358:117a-45: / zhes pa ni khro bo'i rgyal bo rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1358:117a-46: de ltar aom a'a: hum ho: a'a k'a sha b'a
T02D1358:117a-47: yu te rdzo da ka pri thi b'i s'a dhi
T02D1358:117a-48: te bhya: sa pa ri w'a re bhya: ai dam
T02D1358:117a-52: aaksha tam da d'a ma he /
T02D1358:117a-53: te tsam a'a ga tya sa pa ri w'a r'a sh'i ghram ai dam ba lim gri hanntu /
T02D1358:117a-54: khang ntu pi wantu dza: h'um bam ho: sa tri pt'a /
T02D1358:117b-0: sarba stv'a nam sh'intam pushtam raksha a'a @117b wa ra
T02D1358:117b-1: na guptim kurbantu h'um h'um phat badzra dh'a ra a'a
T02D1358:117b-2: jny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:117b-3: zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs bzad par rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1358:117b-4: de ltar aom a'a: h'um ho: braham bishnu nee ri
T02D1358:117b-5: tya b'a yu yam aagne sa mu dre shva rendra
T02D1358:117b-6: / yakshe bhyo: sa pa ri w'a ra bhya: ai dam ba lim gandham pu shpam /
T02D1358:117b-8: aaksha tam da d'a ma he /
T02D1358:117b-9: te tsa a'a ga nyya [?] sa pa ri w'a
T02D1358:117b-10: r'a: sh'i ghram ai dam ba lim grihantu kh'a dantu
T02D1358:117b-11: pi wa ntu dza: hum bam ho: sam tri pt'a
T02D1358:117b-12: / sarba satva n'am sh'intam pushtim raksha a'a ba ra
T02D1358:117b-13: na gu ptim kurbantu h'um h'um phat badzra dha ra
T02D1358:117b-14: a'a dzny'a ba ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:117b-15: zhes pa ni phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1358:117b-16: de ltar aom a'a: hum ho: r'a hu k'a la
T02D1358:117b-17: aagne tsandra s'urya buddha mam ga la shu kra bri
T02D1358:117b-18: ha spa ti ke tu sha ni bhya: sa pa
T02D1358:117b-19: ri w'a rva bhya: ai dam ba kim gandham /
T02D1358:117b-25: te tsa a'a ga tya sa pa ri w'a r'a: sh'i ghram ai d'am ba lim gri hanntu /
T02D1358:117b-28: dza: h'um bam ho: sam tript'a /
T02D1358:117b-29: sarba sa tr'a h'am sh'a ntim pushtim raksha a'a ba ra na gu tim kurbantu h'um h'um phat /
T02D1358:117b-30: badzra dh'a ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:117b-31: zhes pa ni gza' rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1358:117b-32: de ltar aom a'a: hum ho: dza ya bi dza
T02D1358:117b-33: ya padma karko ta ka b'a su ki sham kha
T02D1358:117b-34: p'a la ku li ka aa nanta taksha ka ma
T02D1358:117b-35: h'a padma bhya: sa pa ri w'a re bhya: ai
T02D1358:117b-36: dam ba lim gandham pushpam dh'u pam /
T02D1358:117b-39: te tsa a'a ga tya sa pa ri w'a r'a: sh'i ghram /
T02D1358:117b-40: ai dam ba lim gri han ntu /
T02D1358:117b-43: dza: h'um bam ho: sam tri pt'a /
T02D1358:117b-47: raksha a'a ba ra na gu ptim kurbantu h'um h'um phat /
T02D1358:117b-48: badzra dh'a ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:117b-49: zhes pa ni klu rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1358:117b-50: de ltar aom a'a: h'um ho: be t'a da be
T02D1358:117b-51: kri ta mu kha shva k'a k'a s'u ka ra
T02D1358:117b-52: gri dhra by'a ghro l'u ka dzam buka ga ru
T02D1358:117b-53: da mu khe bhya: sa pa ri w'a re bhya:
T02D1358:117b-54: ai dam ba lim gandham pushpam dh'u pam /
T02D1358:117b-59: sa pa ri w'a r'a: sh'i ghram /
T02D1358:117b-63: dza: h'um bam ho: sam tript'a /
T02D1358:117b-67: raksha a'a ba ra na gu ptim kurbantu h'um h'um phat /
T02D1358:117b-68: badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1358:117b-70: dbyung po rnams kyi gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1358:117b-71: de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1358:117b-72: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02D1358:117b-73: gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su /
T02D1358:117b-74: gsang ba'i 'khor lo ham yig las /
T02D1358:117b-75: khro bo'i 'khor lor gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1358:117b-76: gtsug tor du aom yig las zad par stong pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1358:118a-2: mgrin par ri yig las gzi'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1358:118a-3: snying gar au yig las klu'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1358:118a-4: lte bar li yig las 'byung po'i 'khor lo rab tu gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1358:118a-5: gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1358:118a-6: mgon po byis pa blo dman rnams kyis dran phyir //
T02D1358:118a-7: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po nyid kyi sgrub thabs //
T02D1358:118a-8: las ni phyung bas de yi phyir na yab dang //
T02D1358:118a-9: mtshungs par gang zhig mi gcig phal bzod pa ltar du //
T02D1358:118a-10: bdag la rab tu brtse bas thugs rjes brlan pa
T02D1358:118a-11: bzod par mdzod cig / de ltar dpal dang ldan
T02D1358:118a-12: pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sprul pa /
T02D1358:118a-13: padma dkar pos yang dag par mdzad pa'i dri ma med pa'i 'od las phyung ba /
T02D1358:118a-14: bcom ldan 'das dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba rdzogs so /
T02D1358:118a-16: // / dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po /
T02D1358:118a-17: pandi ta s'a dhu pu tras pandi ta chen po dharma a'a kar sh'anti'i don du mdzad pa /
T02D1358:118a-18: rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po w'a g'i shva ra gupta pa dang /
